actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Resolution that it is the sense of the House that the U.S. Ambassador to Austria be withdrawn until the Austrian Government reinstates its policy permitting transit for Soviet Jews.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the House that the United States Ambassador to Austria be withdrawn until the Austrian Government reinstates its policy permitting transit for Soviet Jews.

titles.title: Resolution that it is the sense of the House that the U.S. Ambassador to Austria be withdrawn until the Austrian Government reinstates its policy permitting transit for Soviet Jews.
